title: Akita
page_copy: Listen to radio stations from Akita, from a wide variety of genres like Community, Emergency & Public Safety, Japanese, Talk and Weather.  Enjoy stations such as エフエム秋田, ABS 秋田放送, ACB FM, エフエム椿台 and more.  Come find the top new songs, playlists, and music!  Listen on your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android, Blackberry, and other app-enabled mobile phones.

title: Fukushima
page_copy: Listen to radio stations from Fukushima, from a wide variety of genres like Entertainment, Japanese, Talk, Top 40 and Weather.  Enjoy stations such as RFCラジオ福島, ふくしまFM, FMポコ, 南三陸災害エフエム and more.  Come find the top new songs, playlists, and music!  Listen on your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android, Blackberry, and other app-enabled mobile phones.

title: Yamagata
page_copy: Listen to radio stations from Yamagata, from a wide variety of genres like Community, Emergency & Public Safety, Hip Hop, News and Talk.  Enjoy stations such as Sound Street Radio, YBC山形放送, Rhythm Station エフエム山形, ラジオ モンスター and more.  Come find the top new songs, playlists, and music!  Listen on your iPhone, iPad, iPod Touch, Android, Blackberry, and other app-enabled mobile phones.

title: 仙台 (Sendai)
